name: Simple Social Share
author: IGNITE®

sections.description:
Simple Social Share by Ignite Online lets you easily add links to the main social platforms with our simple plugin. The plugin comes with a predefined template but it’s fully extensible and allows you to customise just the way you want.
Checkout the readme.md file included in the plugin for examples of how to extend the plugin and customise the template.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ignite-social folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Ignite’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Ignite Social Share? Get in touch with us

  1. Support

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire ignite-social folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Ignite’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

short_description: Share your blog on social platforms quick and easy!
